alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 1:15AM PDT until March 22 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow impacts could vary based on elevation with higher summits and passes receiving several inches more of accumulation over the course of the event.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
